items.sentence: Tom has asked me to go to Boston with him next weekend.
I want you to tell Tom that he can't come here anymore.
Tom said that he and his wife were planning to be here.
Tom will likely spend the rest of his life behind bars?
I thought that you said no one here could speak French.
I thought you said that no one here could speak French.
I don't think Tom will be the first one to fall asleep.
Tom called every hospital in town, trying to find Mary.
I'm driving into town so I can drop you off on the way.
I didn't know that Tom was going to be able to do that.
